name: (PC) GunbrellaMan : Rise of a Hero
short_description:
ATTENTION:

for the MAC version visit: 
https://sourceforge.net/projects/igunbrella/
------------------------------------------------------------------
Crisis is averted and the entire community around this mid sized college rejoices. 
The gunman on campus was simply a student holding an umbrella, mistaken for a rifle by security cameras. Everyone moves on with their day and never looks back.

...Almost everyone.

This is the true story of what happened that day; the story that was hidden from you. The story of a hero rising to protect us and then humbly disappearing into the shadows.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

"GunbrellaMan : Rise of a Hero" is a semester long Project created by a group of 6 Computer Science students from East Carolina University. 

None of us has had any previous experience with Game development, so all feedback is very welcome.

The game was developed using Unity and Maya and was build for PC.
summary: (PC) GunbrellaMan is a Senior Project for a group of students from ECU
